name: The Christmas Kayak Rescue
description:
Collect all the desserts & food items so Santa can have them in time! This game was made as a part of the Secret Santa Game Jam ♥ 

You take on the role of Lyra, a fox red Labrador & your here to save the day. Collect the sweet desserts & other food items kayaking along the way to the North Pole. Beware & make sure to dodge the icebergs along the way.

On the occasion of Christmas all proceedings from this game will be donated to charity. I will also be hosting a small competition & the player who gets the highest score during that time  can choose a charity to which we will be donating some money as well! ♥

What is Secret Santa Jam?

Secret Santa Jam is your opportunity to make a unique personalized game or experience for one special person. After signing up, you will be allocated a person for whom to make a game (a giftee) - and a person will be allocated to make a game for you!

The Christmas Kayak Rescue is based on my giftee's likes & letter they wrote to Santa (me). I hope you enjoyed the game ♥

This was my first game jam that I was a part of & I had a lot of fun making this game. I really learnt a lot & am looking forward to making more amazing games in the future. 
This game features multiple assets made by wonderful people which are all stated below.  A huge thank you to all the creators who have made these amazing assets as well as the organizers of the Secret Santa Game Jam!

Credits:

  • Assets (3D Models & more)
    • 3D Bakery Object by Layer Lab
    • 5 Animated Voxel Animals by VoxelGuy
    • Boats - PolyPack by Alstra Infinite
    • Low Poly Water by Ebru Dogan
    • Low Poly Winter Pack by Broken Vector
    • Nature Pack - Low Poly Trees & Bushes by Downtown Game Studio
    • Sleek Essential UI Pack by F3jry
    • Unity Particle Pack by Unity Technologies
    • Free Winter Mountains 3D Low Poly Pack by Craftpix.net
  • Font
    • Minecraft by Craftron Gaming
  • Sound Effects

  • Background Music
